data.meta_description: (Champion is also the the only class other than monk to get Legendary unarmored prof, if that matters to you thematically.) Ranged Reprisal doesn't leap out as an obvious pick for the build, but getting to reposition with a free Step when your reaction is triggered can be very clutch and meshes well with the goal of creating a choke point.

Champion: With the best armor scaling in the game and easy use for reaction and a fast heal this is the optimal option for a tank. In addition to Cayden Cailean, as mentioned here, Desna would also be a good choice, as one of her titles is literally "Lady Luck." She and Cayden are naturally very good friends. Alignment is going away. Replacing alignment with edicts and anathemas, holy and unholy damage. Tiefling and Aasimar are being replaced by Nephilim. Alchemist, Champion, Oracle, and Witch are getting remastered.

I think you're going to find a class playing a role in Pathfinder 2 is entirely dependent on the feats you choose. It is simply too flexible a system to not consider your feat choices in pursuit of a particular play style.
